intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Juan is a Software Engineer with over 8 years of experience in full-stack development, data science, and cloud computing. He excels in leading technical projects, optimizing software performance, and applying machine learning to real-world agricultural challenges.

SoilNetLLC.achievements: Led the "Digital Agronomist" project's technical development, guiding frontend (React), backend (Node.js), database (MariaDB), and Python ETL implementations.;Applied statistical and machine learning methods to improve the accuracy of nutrient predictions (e.g., nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium) and integrated weather data for a holistic view on nutrient management.;Refined data cleaning and processing techniques to ensure high-quality datasets for agronomic modeling.

RuedataInc.achievements: Participated on the system, project design and development of the new Rue Lite Mobile App for Android and iOS using React Native;Supported decision making for the Rue Lite Mobile app product.

SoilNetLLCResearcher.achievements: Conducted research for the "Digital Agronomist" project while awaiting STEM OPT authorization.;Mentored interns on data science solutions, covering database design, API integrations, and predictive models for agronomy.

UniversityOfWisconsinWhitewater.achievements: Mentored 20+ students in Python programming courses, enhancing their skills in programming projects.;Graded and reviewed over 500 labs and assignments, providing constructive feedback to support student learning.

UruIT.achievements: Developed a high-performance login widget using the Native Web Components API, compatible with React and Vue projects.;Reduced technical debt by 60% with a cross-framework solution, enabling faster deployment and streamlined maintenance.

BunnyStudio.achievements: Rebuilt a legacy AngularJS UI system with ReactJS & NextJS, improving page load times by 80% and boosting user engagement.;Resolved critical bugs in systems using Node.js, PHP, Python, and Elixir, and improved code quality through comprehensive reviews.

VIGPROSAS.achievements: Designed a PostgreSQL database and backend with Ruby on Rails and Node.js, optimizing API integrations and reducing costs.;Led three cross-functional teams, ensuring high-quality code and best practices across Ruby, JavaScript, and PHP projects.;Automated CI/CD pipelines for AWS, improving deployment reliability and reducing release times.

ImaginamosDigitalAgency.achievements: Developed a high-performance e-commerce platform with NextJS and Redux, boosting online sales for La 14 supermarket.;Enhanced user experience for Cardash through dynamic UI components using React and GraphQL.

Devhack.role: Teacher of React and React Native Courses
Devhack.achievements: Instructed ReactJS courses with a focus on Redux and mobile-first design, mentoring students in modern web development practices.

PulpoWMS.achievements: Developed and optimized Material Design web components for Pulpo WMS using React, Redux, and ImmutableJS.

Creadev.achievements: Designed and developed web applications for startups, focusing on modern UI/UX principles, responsive design, and performance optimization.;Led frontend development using JavaScript, React, and modern web technologies to deliver scalable and maintainable solutions.;Collaborated with early-stage businesses to translate ideas into functional MVPs, guiding product development from concept to deployment.
